Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.name: payType
Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.abstract: Payment type which choosed by customer. ex:visa.

Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.name: reason
Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.abstract: The reason that consumer refunds the order.

Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.name: revenue
Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.abstract: Total revenue of order including shipping fee.

Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.name: shipType
Enums/TransactionParam.html#/s:12iKalaTr.abstract: Shipping type which choosed by customer. ex:fedex.

Enums/TransactionName.html#/s:12iKalaTra.name: purchase
Enums/TransactionName.html#/s:12iKalaTra.abstract: This transaction hit can be sent after the purchase is successfully completed. The tracking code can be placed at the moment the order is completed, which may be the transaction receipt page.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: couponAmount
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: discount amount.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: couponId
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Coupon code for item which can be purchased.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: couponType
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: coupon name or description. ex:summer_discount,50_percent_off.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: currency
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The currency of a item.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: itemId
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The unique ID of item.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: itemIdList
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: List of item ID. It is a comma separated string to represent more than one item. ex: ID123,ID456,ID789.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: itemCateId
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The unique ID of item category.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: loginType
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: It can be the login method like email,facebook,google, or user’s identity like user,admin.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: minPrice
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Minimum price of item which is acceptable by consumer.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: maxPrice
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Maximum price of item which is acceptable by consumer.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: option
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: option on step in checkout flow. ex: use visa as payment, or use fedex as shipping.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: payType
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Payment type which choosed by consumer. ex:visa.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: price
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The price of a item.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: quantity
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The quantity of a item.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: registerType
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: It can be the register method like email,facebook,google, or user’s identity like user,admin.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: resultSize
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The number of search results.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: shipType
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Shipping type which choosed by consumer. ex:fedex.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: sku
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: Stock Keeping Unit.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: skuList
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: List of Stock Keeping Unit. It is a comma separated string to represent more than one item. ex: SKU-A-1,SKU-B-2,SKU-C-3.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: step
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: step of checkout flow.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: which
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The name of element clicked by user.

Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.name: word
Enums/EventParam.html#/s:12iKalaTracker1.abstract: The search string/keyword used.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: checkoutProcess
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: You can customized your checkout steps in checkout process. ex: choosing payment type, choosing shipping type, fill in credit card number, etc.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: click
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: After click element on web/app, send this event.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: confirmCartList
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: When user click checkout button at shopping cart page, send this event.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: getCoupon
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: Coupon codes, also known as promo codes or discount codes. “getCoupon” event means user get coupon code from web/app.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: searchFilter
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: “searchFilter” event mean search products by many condition . Send this event When user clicked search button.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: searchWord
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: search products by keyword. send this event after server return searched result.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: useCoupon
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: send this command when user enter coupon code into web/app.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: viewItem
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: send this event when user viewed product-detail page.

Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.name: viewItemList
Enums/EventName.html#/s:12iKalaTracker9E.abstract: User saw the items in item list.

Enums/EventParam.html.name: EventParam
Enums/EventParam.html.abstract: EventParam contains all the keys of Event parameters. You can use these constants as the key to generate a parameters dictionary for Tracker.shared.addEvent(name: EventName, params: [String: Any]).

Enums/TransactionParam.html.name: TransactionParam
Enums/TransactionParam.html.abstract: TransactionParam contains all the keys of Transaction parameters.. You can use these constants as the key to generate a parameters dictionary for Tracker.shared.addTransaction(name: EventName, params: [String: Any]).

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.name: isAutoLogActivityPageEnabled
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.abstract: Gets if the switch of viewController if auto logged. The default is true.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.name: setUserId(userId:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.abstract: Sets id of the end user. The user id will be attached in the following hits.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.name: addEvent(name:params:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.abstract: Adds an event. This event will be sent to iKala server in appropriate time.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.name: addTransaction(name:params:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.abstract: Adds a transaction. This transaction will be sent to iKala server in appropriate time.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.name: setCurrentPage(className:title:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:12iKalaTracker0B.abstract: Adds a transaction. This transaction will be sent to iKala server in appropriate time.

Classes/Tracker.html.name: Tracker
Classes/Tracker.html.abstract: Tracker is used track events in your app. You can use Tracker to send hits like Event, Transaction, and PageView to iKala server.
